page.title: 19MYLOR BOATYARD
page.content:
Moorings:
At Mylor harbour there are 320 boat-moorings altogether,most of them are taken up by yachts or small pleasure craft. In spring the boat-yard is at it's buisiest with the Americans coming over and buying boats with the currently strong dollar value. For the yard people, the winter is the most buisest time and for the people who do the craning, it is spring and autumn.
Nearby is the Restronguet Sailing club with a flurishing membership of dingy sailors. Each season a busy calender of racing events take place collumating with the regata.
